parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Power Steering Gear Mounting Bracket Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive flexing or bending of the power steering gear mounting bracket can lead to a loss of steering control, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: or bends when turning the steering wheel
the power steering gear mounting bracket exhibits excessive flexing or bending
the steering box mounted to the bracket flexes excessively.
